metadata.title: CVE-2024-35874 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:aio: Fix null ptr deref in aio_complete() wakeuplist_del_init_careful() needs to be the last access to the wait queueentry - it effectively unlocks access.Previously, finish_wait() would see the empty list head and skip takingthe lock, and then we'd return - but the completion path would stillattempt to do the wakeup after the task_struct pointer had beenoverwritten.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
